mapper.insert: insert into bas_health_nurse (id, operRoomId, operaDate, healthnurse, beid) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operaDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthnurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bas_health_nurse
id,
operRoomId,
operaDate,
healthnurse,
beid,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operaDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{healthnurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update bas_health_nurse
operRoomId = #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operaDate = #{operaDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
healthnurse = #{healthnurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.operRoomId,(select op.name from bas_operroom op where op.operRoomId = t.operRoomId) as "operRoomName",t.operaDate,t.healthnurse,(select su.name from bas_user su where su.userName = t.healthnurse) as "healthnurseName" from bas_health_nurse t where t.operRoomId = #{operRoomId} and t.operaDate = #{operaDate} and t.beid = #{beid}
